T1.label: Energy Transition Winner
T1.description: Energy Transition Winner — Sustainability Revenue Grows to 60%+
T1.plain_english: Worley is positioning as the go-to engineering partner for the energy transition with sustainability revenue growing rapidly.
T1.what_to_watch: Sustainability revenue mix, new contract wins in hydrogen/CCS/offshore wind, IRA and EU Green Deal funding.
T1.upside: Material re-rating if sustainability revenue exceeds 60% and margins converge with traditional energy.
T1.risk_plain: If project delays persist and sustainability margins remain structurally lower, growth thesis weakens.

T2.label: Traditional Energy Cash Cow
T2.description: Traditional Energy Cash Cow — LNG and Upstream Sustain
T2.plain_english: Traditional energy still generates ~50% of revenue at higher margins, providing the cash flow foundation.
T2.what_to_watch: LNG investment cycle, Middle East upstream capex, oil price trajectory.
T2.upside: If traditional energy spending sustains, segment provides stable cash flow and higher margins.
T2.risk_plain: If oil prices collapse below US$60/bbl, traditional energy capex would be cut sharply.

T3.label: Margin Pressure
T3.description: Margin Pressure — Integration Drag and Fixed-Price Exposure
T3.plain_english: EBITA margin remains below the 8-9% target due to legacy fixed-price contracts and lower sustainability margins.
T3.what_to_watch: Quarterly EBITA margin, fixed-price contract run-off, sustainability vs traditional margin gap.
T3.risk_plain: If margins cannot reach 8%+ by FY26, the market will question management execution credibility.

T4.label: Cyclical Downturn
T4.plain_english: A global recession triggers simultaneous cuts in both traditional and sustainability energy capex.
T4.what_to_watch: Global recession indicators, oil price, government clean energy subsidy policies, backlog cancellations.
T4.risk_plain: In past downturns revenue fell 20-30% and margins compressed to near-zero; elevated leverage amplifies risk.

big_picture: Worley Limited (ASX: WOR) — coverage initiated. Full analysis pending.
